title: I am good in science and maths too then what should I do after 10th? - Quora

response.answer_text: Believe in what you are and in what you are comfortable with. Passion for a subject does not mean getting good grades, it means you enjoy it. After class 10 you have to devote maximum time to minimum subjects that you will chose. If you are passionate about science stream then go for it. But if you feel that you are more comfortable with some other subject(s) or you love that other subject(s) more than science subjects go with your fresh opinion. It will motivate you to study furthur and will help you to climb high. Wishing u all the best!

Hello, if your are focused to take engineering go for Diploma in related field. and if you want to continue in biology science and maths, the best option is Science field but you should be focused in that too. Be away from the college life and enjoyment if you wanna take science.
